t: O give thanks{H3034}{(H8685)} unto the LORD{H3068}; for he is good{H2896}: because his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
Let Israel{H3478} now say{H559}{(H8799)}, that his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
Let the house{H1004} of Aaron{H175} now say{H559}{(H8799)}, that his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
Let them now that fear{H3373} the LORD{H3068} say{H559}{(H8799)}, that his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
I called{H7121}{(H8804)} upon the LORD{H3050} in distress{H4712}: the LORD{H3050} answered{H6030}{(H8804)} me, and set me in a large place{H4800}.
The LORD{H3068} is on my side; I will not fear{H3372}{(H8799)}: what can{H6213} man{H120} do{H6213}{(H8799)} unto me?
The LORD{H3068} taketh my part with them that help{H5826}{(H8802)} me: therefore shall I see{H7200}{(H8799)} my desire upon them that hate{H8130}{(H8802)} me.
It is better{H2896} to trust{H2620}{(H8800)} in the LORD{H3068} than to put confidence{H982}{(H8800)} in man{H120}.
It is better{H2896} to trust{H2620}{(H8800)} in the LORD{H3068} than to put confidence{H982}{(H8800)} in princes{H5081}.
All nations{H1471} compassed me about{H5437}{(H8804)}: but in the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068} will I destroy{H4135}{(H8686)} them.
They compassed me about{H5437}{(H8804)}; yea, they compassed me about{H5437}{(H8804)}: but in the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068} I will destroy{H4135}{(H8686)} them.

They compassed me about{H5437}{(H8804)} like bees{H1682}; they are quenched{H1846}{(H8795)} as the fire{H784} of thorns{H6975}: for in the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068} I will destroy{H4135}{(H8686)} them.
Thou hast thrust{H1760}{(H8804)} sore{H1760}{(H8800)} at me that I might fall{H5307}{(H8800)}: but the LORD{H3068} helped{H5826}{(H8804)} me.
The LORD{H3050} is my strength{H5797} and song{H2176}, and is become my salvation{H3444}.
The voice{H6963} of rejoicing{H7440} and salvation{H3444} is in the tabernacles{H168} of the righteous{H6662}: the right hand{H3225} of the LORD{H3068} doeth{H6213}{(H8802)} valiantly{H2428}.
The right hand{H3225} of the LORD{H3068} is exalted{H7426}{(H8802)}: the right hand{H3225} of the LORD{H3068} doeth{H6213}{(H8802)} valiantly{H2428}.
I shall not die{H4191}{(H8799)}, but live{H2421}{(H8799)}, and declare{H5608}{(H8762)} the works{H4639} of the LORD{H3050}.
The LORD{H3050} hath chastened{H3256}{(H8765)} me sore{H3256}{(H8763)}: but he hath not given me over{H5414}{(H8804)} unto death{H4194}.
Open{H6605}{(H8798)} to me the gates{H8179} of righteousness{H6664}: I will go{H935}{(H8799)} into them, and I will praise{H3034}{(H8686)} the LORD{H3050}:
This gate{H8179} of the LORD{H3068}, into which the righteous{H6662} shall enter{H935}{(H8799)}.
I will praise{H3034}{(H8686)} thee: for thou hast heard{H6030}{(H8804)} me, and art become my salvation{H3444}.
The stone{H68} which the builders{H1129}{(H8802)} refused{H3988}{(H8804)} is become the head{H7218} stone of the corner{H6438}.
This is the LORD'S{H3068} doing; it is marvellous{H6381}{(H8738)} in our eyes{H5869}.
This is the day{H3117} which the LORD{H3068} hath made{H6213}{(H8804)}; we will rejoice{H1523}{(H8799)} and be glad{H8055}{(H8799)} in it.
Save{H3467}{(H8685)} now, I beseech{H577} thee, O LORD{H3068}: O LORD{H3068}, I beseech{H577} thee, send now prosperity{H6743}{(H8685)}.
Blessed{H1288}{(H8803)} be he that cometh{H935}{(H8802)} in the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068}: we have blessed{H1288}{(H8765)} you out of the house{H1004} of the LORD{H3068}.
God{H410} is the LORD{H3068}, which hath shewed us light{H215}{(H8686)}: bind{H631}{(H8798)} the sacrifice{H2282} with cords{H5688}, even unto the horns{H7161} of the altar{H4196}.
Thou art my God{H410}, and I will praise{H3034}{(H8686)} thee: thou art my God{H430}, I will exalt{H7311}{(H8787)} thee.
O give thanks{H3034}{(H8685)} unto the LORD{H3068}; for he is good{H2896}: for his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.
